meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seam-like or having seams.
meanings.sent1: The seaminess of the fabric made it easy to tear along the edges.
meanings.sent2: I noticed the seaminess of the dress when the thread started coming loose.
meanings.sent3: The seaminess of the situation was evident when the two sides couldn't agree on a solution.
meanings.sent4: The seaminess of the old building gave it a sense of history and character.
meanings.sent5: The seaminess of the map helped me locate where the pieces connected.

meanings.definition: The presence of seams or visible stitching in a fabric or material.
meanings.sent1: The seaminess of the quilt added a charming handmade touch to the room.
meanings.sent2: She admired the seaminess of the leather jacket, appreciating the craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The seaminess of the curtains gave the room a cozy, rustic feel.
meanings.sent4: The seaminess of the baseball glove reminded him of all the games he played.
meanings.sent5: The seaminess of the carpet showed the attention to detail in the design.
